article: chinese foreign ministry spokesman tang guoqiang , responding to journalists ' questions about us representative frank r. wolf 's remarks about what he allegedly saw and heard in tibet , said that they were `` lamentable '' .
abstract: chinese spokesman disputes us congressman 's comments on tibet
